title: S7E15 – "The Worst Monsters" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Elias Witherow, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about unsettling attractions, perilous promotions, aerial anomalies, and villainous visitors.

                            
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
